#summary OpenPGM : C Reference : pgm_snmp_shutdown()
#labels Phase-Implementation

_Function_
=== Declaration ===
<pre>
#include <pgm/snmp.h>

int *pgm_snmp_shutdown* (void);
</pre>

=== Purpose ===
Stop and destroy a running SNMP agent or master agent.

=== Return Value ===
On success, 0 is returned.
